title: Requesting Removal of RP from my Account.
body:
What the title says. 
I have 8 RP in my account and it's bugging the hell out of me. 
Riot, can you send your Poros to steal my RP away. I'll let them take it I promise. 
{{sticker:garen-swing}}

replies.body: 8 is such a good number, why doe.  >.<  I'm not sure if we can do this, but you can certainly seek out the billing team to find out via [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  What about it is bothering you?

I had 8 beautiful kittens back when I was a kid. We also had a yellow dog that we kept in a cage. One day our neighbor had to borrow the cage so we let the dog out. The very same day, we realized a kitten went missing, then another one, and another one. We as a family, were confused as to where the kittens went and we later figured out that the dog had killed every single one of them. 8 may be a good number to some, but to me it only brings back nightmares and horrific images in my mind. Please!! I'll submit a ticket! Take them away RIOT! I don't want the 8RP!!! I'll do anything!
